action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the sandwich in the freezer, the book in the wardrobe and the mop on the table.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a broom closet now. There are a broom and a mop. The broom is on the floor. The mop is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You take the mop. In your inventory you have a mop.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a living room, a broom closet and a bedroom here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a freezer. The cupboard is closed. The freezer is closed. There are passages to a hallway and a pantry here.
The cupboard is now open. In the cupboard there is a plate.
You take the plate. In your inventory you have a mop and a plate.
You are in a pantry now. There are a refrigerator and a table. The refrigerator is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a freezer. The cupboard is open. The freezer is closed. There are passages to a hallway and a pantry here.
The freezer is now open. The freezer is empty.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a living room, a broom closet and a bedroom here.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a shelf, a book, a couch and a chair. The book is on the side table. There is a passage to a hallway here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a living room, a broom closet and a bedroom here.
You are in a bedroom now. There are a wardrobe and a bed. The wardrobe is closed. There is a passage to a hallway here.
The wardrobe is now open. In the wardrobe there is a pillow.
You can't go to a living room from here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a living room, a broom closet and a bedroom here.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a shelf, a book, a couch and a chair. The book is on the side table. There is a passage to a hallway here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
I don't know how to interpret this 'drop' action.
You can't go to a bedroom from here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a living room, a broom closet and a bedroom here.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a shelf, a book, a couch and a chair. The book is on the side table. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You can't see a wardrobe here.
You can't go to a bedroom from here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a living room, a broom closet and a bedroom here.
You are in a bedroom now. There are a pillow, a wardrobe and a bed. The pillow is in the wardrobe. The wardrobe is open. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You can't see a book here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
I don't know how to interpret this 'drop' action.
You can't go to a living room from here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a living room, a broom closet and a bedroom here.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a shelf, a book, a couch and a chair. The book is on the side table. There is a passage to a hallway here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a living room, a broom closet and a bedroom here.
You are in a bedroom now. There are a pillow, a wardrobe and a bed. The pillow is in the wardrobe. The wardrobe is open. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You put the mop in the wardrobe.
You can't see a book here.
You can't go to a living room from here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a living room, a broom closet and a bedroom here.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a shelf, a book, a couch and a chair. The book is on the side table. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You take the book. In your inventory you have a book and a plate.
You can't go to a bedroom from here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a living room, a broom closet and a bedroom here.
You are in a bedroom now. There are a pillow, a wardrobe, a bed and a mop. The pillow is in the wardrobe. The wardrobe is open. The mop is in the wardrobe. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a living room, a broom closet and a bedroom here.
You are in a bedroom now. There are a pillow, a wardrobe, a bed and a mop. The pillow is in the wardrobe. The wardrobe is open. The mop is in the wardrobe. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You put the book in the wardrobe.
